hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $1,500 prize for the best mobile app for non-professionals (patients, families, friends) that addresses PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder). For judging criteria and other rules, please go to

$1,500 prize for the best mobile app for professionals (physicians, psychologists, clinical staff) that addresses PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder). For judging criteria and other rules, please go to
$1,000 prize for the most impressive technical hack in a mobile app that addresses PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder). For judging criteria and other rules, please go to
$1,000 prize for the best overall hack in a mobile app that addresses PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder). For judging criteria and other rules, please go to
$500 prize for the people's choice in a mobile app that addresses PTSD (post-traumatic stress disorder). For judging criteria and other rules, please go to
